name: CountdowntoOaklandRaidersMatch
0:
”Alexa, ask raider nation how many days until kickoff”
”Alexa, ask raider nation how long until kickoff”
”Alexa, ask raider nation how far away is kickoff”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: Want to know how long until the Raiders take the field for another win?! Just ask Alexa!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
